description:
As the Vice President of Business Development, you'll be a crucial part of our Strategic Development Team. Your role will focus on scouting and securing innovative partnership and commercial opportunities that propel our growth. Reporting to the Senior Vice President of Business Development, you'll lead and mentor a dedicated team in identifying groundbreaking ventures and strategic investments that enhance our core offerings and tap into new markets.

Key Responsibilities:

Lead the identification, negotiation, and management of strategic partnerships and deals, ensuring they align with our short-term and long-term objectives.
Collaborate closely with internal stakeholders and business units to ensure strategies and deals reflect our comprehensive interests.
Foster strong internal relationships, including with executive leadership, to support and advance partnership opportunities and growth initiatives.
Stay ahead of emerging technologies and industry trends to identify new growth drivers and product concepts.
Represent us as a thought leader within the digital, media, and technology communities, networking with peers across various sectors.
Lead, inspire, and develop your team, encouraging innovative thinking and proactive advocacy for new opportunities.
Manage all aspects of deal processes from scouting to negotiation, ensuring successful execution and maintenance of partnerships.

Who You Are:

An experienced leader with a track record of forging new business partnerships and negotiating complex agreements.
Knowledgeable about media, technology, and communication industries, with a keen eye on market trends and strategies.
A strong communicator and influencer, capable of representing our vision both internally and externally.
Willing to be based in the Philadelphia area with flexibility for travel as needed.
Financially savvy, with a preference for those experienced in corporate deal structures.
A holder of a Bachelor's degree in a relevant field, with an MBA strongly preferred.
Boasting over 15 years of experience in business development or general management within telecom, technology, media, and/or entertainment sectors.

What We Offer:

A collaborative work environment where your contributions are recognized and valued.
Opportunities for personal and professional growth.
Competitive compensation, including bonuses/commissions and best-in-class benefits.
A commitment to diversity and inclusion in the workplace.

Education & Experience:

Master's Degree preferred, or a combination of coursework and extensive professional experience.
15+ years of relevant work experience.
We are excited to welcome candidates who share our dedication to driving innovation and delivering excellence. Join us in redefining the future of media and technology.

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.
Employment Type: Full-Time
Salary: $ 158,000.00 Per Year
